🍁 “Pandora: Beneath The Paradise” – An tvN Original Sixteen-Episodic South Korean Revenge Tragedy Action Thriller Mystery Drama Television Series – A fierce survival story of a woman who must take the position of first lady to protect her beloved family.

📝 PLOT :- The Series Tells The Story Of Hong Tae-Ra (Ji-Ah) Who Seems To Have A Perfect Life With Her Husband Pyo Jae-Hyun But Doesn’t Remember Her Past. One day, She Regains The Memory Of Her Harrowing Past And Decides To Take Revenge On Those Who Responsible For Her Past !!
